recipe.title: Gooey Chocolate Microwave Mug Cake with Caramel Sauce and Peanuts
ingredients: 2 (heaping) tablespoons 3-Ingredient Microwave Caramel Sauce or storebought caramel sauce, divided
1 teaspoon coarsely chopped roasted, salted peanuts
A 12-ounce microwave-safe mug (preferably thin-walled) or deep bowl
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt in mug. Add cream, oil, and 3 Tbsp. water and mix until smooth. Using a spoon, make a well in the center; spoon half of the caramel sauce into well. Microwave on high 60 seconds. Carefully remove from microwave. Top with ice cream (if desired), peanuts, and remaining caramel sauce. Serve immediately.
